Constructor Detail

LoginButton

public LoginButton()

LoginButton

public LoginButton(boolean autologoutlink)
Parameters:
autologoutlink - - if true, the button will act as logout button whenever a user is logged in.

LoginButton

public LoginButton(boolean alsoLogout,
                   LoginButton.Size size,
                   LoginButton.Background background,
                   LoginButton.Length length)
Parameters:
alsoLogout - - if true, the button will act as logout button whenever a user is logged in.
size - - customize the look of the button by selecting SMALL, MEDIUM or LARGE. (Default LARGE)
background - - background color of your site so that the edges of the button can be matched (WHITE, LIGHT or DARK). (Default LIGHT)
length - - specifies the length of text to use for the button (SHORT: "Connect" or LONG: "Connect with Facebook"). (Default SHORT)
